name: Sales Invoice - Circuit ID
query:
SELECT
    si.name AS "Invoice No:Link/Sales Invoice:150",
    si.posting_date AS "Invoice Date:Date:100",
    si.customer AS "Customer:Link/Customer:150",
    si.custom_start_date AS "Start Date:Date:100",
    si.custom_end_date AS "End Date:Date:100",
    si.po_no AS "PO No:Data:120",
    si.custom_invoice_mode AS "Invoice Mode:Data:120",
    
    sii.custom_circuit_id AS "Circuit ID:Data:150",
    sii.custom_item_description AS "Description:Data:200",
    sii.amount AS "Net Invoice Amount:Currency:120",
    ROUND(sii.amount * 1.18, 2) AS "Invoice Amount:Currency:120",
    
    -- Extract first date (start) from description
    SUBSTRING(sii.description, LOCATE(' ', sii.description) + 1, 10) AS "Extracted Start Date:Data:120",

    -- Extract second date (end) after 'to'
    SUBSTRING_INDEX(sii.description, 'to ', -1) AS "Extracted End Date:Data:120"

FROM `tabSales Invoice` si
LEFT JOIN `tabSales Invoice Item` sii ON sii.parent = si.name

WHERE si.docstatus = 1  -- Only Submitted Invoices

ORDER BY si.posting_date DESC, si.name DESC;
